name: Kids Memory Game 2
description:
Kids Memory Game 2
-is a card game with images of various insects that will test your memory. The object of the game is to find paired cards. This can be tricky enough because the game features only insect images. With Kids Memory Game 2, you can train your memory and your child's memory.
- There is also a "training" section in the game, click on the insect card to hear its name in English.
